name: [Browser] Blossoms Bloom Brightest
description:
* Ren'Py Web is still in-development. This browser build may be unstable and cause audio stutters and/or visual lag/errors. We recommend disabling Transitions in the settings menu for the best experience.

For a stable release, please download the PC, Mac, or Linux version of BBB here.

SYNOPSIS:

Three strangers are thrust into an unexpected situation together—they awaken only to find themselves on a spaceship called the Blossom.

A mysterious journey lies ahead of them; what misadventures will they experience over the next two weeks?

CHARACTERS:

FEATURES:

  • Two to three hours of gameplay
  • Two routes
  • Four endings
  • Four CGs
  • Partial voice acting
